author: The Manim Community Developers
owocado
install_msg:
This cog lets you evaluate Manim code snippets to render short mathematical animations through Manim python animation engine.
You can find out how to setup this cog and Manim here: https://github.com/owocado/owo-cogs/blob/main/manim/README.md
name: Manim
description: Render mathematical animations with Manim animation engine.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data about users.
